message(STATUS "USE_QPOASES=${USE_QPOASES}")
message(STATUS "USE_QPOASES_IN_SEQUENCER=${USE_QPOASES_IN_SEQUENCER}")
message(STATUS "USE_OSQP_IN_SEQUENCER=${USE_OSQP_IN_SEQUENCER}")
message(STATUS "USE_EIQUADPROG_IN_SEQUENCER=${USE_EIQUADPROG_IN_SEQUENCER}")
if(USE_QPOASES OR USE_QPOASES_IN_SEQUENCER)
  add_subdirectory(qpOASES)
endif()
if(USE_OSQP_IN_SEQUENCER)
  add_subdirectory(osqp)
endif()
